content.text: They change some euros (€) and receive $1962 (New Zealand dollars)
The exchange rate is €1 = $1.635
Calculate the number of euros they change
The family spend \(15\%\) of their New Zealand dollars on a tour
Calculate the number of dollars they have left
The family visit two waterfalls, the Humboldt Falls and the Bridal Veil Falls
The ratio of the heights Humboldt Falls : Bridal Veil Falls \(= 5:1\)
The Humboldt Falls are \(220 \text{m}\) higher than the Bridal Veil Falls
Calculate the height of the Humboldt Falls
The Muller family are on holiday in New Zealand
Water flows over the Browne Falls at a rate of 3680 litres per second
After rain, this rate increases to 9752 litres per second
Calculate the percentage increase in this rate
After rain, water flows over the Sutherland Falls at a rate of 74 240 litres per second
This is an increase of \(45\%\) on the rate before the rain
Calculate the rate before the rain
.........  litres/second
Simplify
\(y\) is inversely proportional to the square of \((x + 2)\)
When \(x = 3, y = 2\)
Find \(y\) when \(x = 8\)
Write as a single fraction in its simplest form
Describe fully the **single** transformation that maps triangle \(A\) onto triangle \(B\)
triangle \(A\) after a reflection in the \(x\)-axis,
triangle \(A\) after a translation by the vector \(\begin{pmatrix} 7 \\ - 5 \end{pmatrix}\),
triangle \(A\) after the transformation represented by the matrix \(\begin{pmatrix} 0.5 & 0 \\ 0 & 0.5 \end{pmatrix}\)
On the grid, draw the image of
Use factorisation to solve the equation \(2x^{2} + 3x - 20 = 0\)
Calculate \(BC\)
The diagram shows a right-angled triangle \(ABC\)
The area of this triangle is \(30\mathrm{cm}^2\)
Complete the table of values
Draw the graph of \(y = x^{3} - 3x - 1\) for \(-3 \leqslant x \leqslant 3\)
On the grid, draw this tangent
Find the co-ordinates of the point where the tangent meets your graph
Find the equation of the tangent
Give your answer in the form \(y = mx + c\)
A straight line through (0, \(-17\)) is a tangent to the graph of \(y = x^{3} - 3x - 1\)
By drawing a suitable straight line on the grid, solve the equation \(x^{3} - 6x - 3 = 0\)
The table shows some values of \(y = x^{3} - 3x - 1\)
Calculate the acceleration of the runner for the first 3 seconds
Calculate the total distance travelled by the runner in the 19 seconds
The runner and the walker are travelling in the same direction along the same path
When \(t = 0\), the runner is 10 metres behind the walker
Find how far the runner is ahead of the walker when \(t = 19\)
The diagram shows the speed–time graph for part of a journey for two people, a runner and a walker
Find angle \(BAO\)
Find angle \(AOC\)
Find angle \(ABC\)
Find angle \(CDA\)
In the diagram, \(A\), \(B\), \(C\) and \(D\) lie on the circle, centre \(O\)
\(EA\) is a tangent to the circle at \(A\)
Angle \(EAB = 61^{\circ}\) and angle \(BAC = 55^{\circ}\)
A plane flies from Geneva to Hamburg
The flight takes 2 hours 20 minutes
Calculate the average speed in kilometres per hour
Use the cosine rule to calculate the distance from Geneva to Budapest
Find the bearing of Hamburg from Budapest
Calculate the bearing of Budapest from Geneva
The bearing of Budapest from Hamburg is \(133^{\circ}\)
The diagram shows the positions of three cities, Geneva \((G)\), Budapest \((B)\) and Hamburg \((H)\)
Use the mid-points of the intervals to calculate an estimate of the mean
Complete this histogram to show the information in the table
The table shows the amount of time, \(T\) minutes, 120 people each spend in a supermarket one Saturday

table.html:
Time (T minutes)Number of people
10 < T ≤ 3016
30 < T ≤ 4018
40 < T ≤ 4522
45 < T ≤ 5040
50 < T ≤ 6021
60 < T ≤ 703

content.text: This histogram shows the amount of time, \(T\) minutes, 120 people each spend in the supermarket one Wednesday
Make a comment comparing the distributions of the times for the two days
Show that 90 million litres of water flows out in 20 minutes
Beneath the surface, the lake has vertical sides
Calculate the drop in the water level of the lake when the gates are open for 20 minutes
Give your answer in centimetres
The cross-section of a gate is a sector of a circle with radius \(8.5 \text{m}\) and angle \(76^{\circ}\)
Calculate the perimeter of the sector
The lake behind a dam has an area of 55 hectares
When the gates in the dam are open, water flows out at a rate of 75 000 litres per second
Calculate the volume of this cone
[The volume, \(V,\) of a cone with radius \(r\) and height \(h\) is \(V = \frac{1}{3}\pi r^2h.\) ]
The cone is cut, parallel to its base, to give a smaller cone
The volume of the smaller cone is half the volume of the original cone
The smaller cone is melted down to make two different spheres
The ratio of the radii of these two spheres is 1 : 2
Calculate the radius of the smaller sphere
[The volume, \(V,\) of a sphere with radius \(r\) is \(V = \frac{4}{3}\pi r^3.\) ]
A solid metal cone has radius \(10\mathrm{cm}\) and height \(36\mathrm{cm}\)
Find \(3\mathbf{a} - 2\mathbf{b}\)
\(\begin{pmatrix} & \\ & \end{pmatrix}\)
Find \(\mid \mathbf{a}\mid .\)
Write down two simultaneous equations and solve them to find the value of \(m\) and the value of \(n\). Show all your working
\(\mathbf{a} = \begin{pmatrix} - 3 \\ 2 \end{pmatrix}\)
Find, in terms of \(\mathbf{a}\) and \(\mathbf{c}\), in its simplest form,
Find the value of \(k\)
$OAB$ is a triangle and \(C\) is the mid-point of \(OB.\)
\(D\) is on \(AB\) such that \(AD:DB = 3:5.\)
\(OAE\) is a straight line such that \(OA:AE = 2:3.\)
\(\overrightarrow{OA} = \mathbf{a}\) and \(\overrightarrow{OC} = \mathbf{c}\)
Show that the probability that she takes two packets of salt flavoured chips is \(\frac{9}{38}\)
Find the probability that she takes two packets of different flavoured chips
Maria takes two packets at random **without replacement**
Maria takes three packets at random, **without replacement**, from the 20 packets
Find the probability that she takes **at least two** packets of chicken flavoured chips
A box contains 20 packets of potato chips
6 packets contain barbecue flavoured chips
10 packets contain salt flavoured chips
4 packets contain chicken flavoured chips
